name: Testmap
description2: On the night before the battle, both armies organised a "ceremony" to prepare for the battle to come. The Saxon army held a feast that lasts the whole night fill both food and alcohol, while the Norman army organised a Christian prayer for the troop by the clergymen and slept until the morning. The two armies march out early in the morning and start fighting at dawn around 9 AM until the beginning of dusk around 5 PM. No matter who wins this battle, England, led by the true king, would see major changes in every aspect.
